author: mattmann
msg: 2.2.0 release of the cas-crawler. One major bugfix (OODT-241) and a few
new features and improvements. Thanks to mattmann and bfoster for contributions
to this release. See CHANGES.txt file for a full list of changes in this

author: mattmann
msg: 1.5.0 release of the workflow manager includes a few new features and improvements.
One notable feature is that WorkflowTaskInstances throw exceptions now, so
all existing WorkflowTaskInstances need to be updated to leverage this new
interface. Thanks to bfoster and faranak for their contributions. See
CHANGES.txt for a full list of updates in this release.
